bibl.title: Housman and A.S. Hunt.
bibl.note: Presents an unpublished set of letters from A.E. Housman to A.S. Hunt, illustrating Housman's contribution to the edition of the P. Oxy.
bibl.seg: 160 Housman Alfred Edward Hunt Arthur Surridge
LEHNUS Luigi, Housman and A.S. Hunt.
David J. BUTTERFIELD and Christopher A. STRAY (Edd.), A.E. Housman. Classical Scholar (London, 2009) pp. 217-227.
Presents an unpublished set of letters from A.E. Housman to A.S. Hunt, illustrating Housman's contribution to the edition of the P. Oxy.
